      • IntersectionCheck

        public static java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> IntersectionCheck(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer>> hm,
                                                                     java.util.ArrayList<Portfolio.Investment> investAdd,
                                                                     java.lang.String compName)
        User-defined function (used for search purposes) that uses HashMap to match the companyName (user entered for search) (parsed company name ) with each key and if keys matched in Hashmap -> get content in set-> find indexes that are common to both key words mapped (in set))
        Parameters:
        Investment - arrayList.
        HashMap - HashSet > (HashMap)
        String - CompName (user entered for search)
        Returns:
        HashSet HashSet of common indexes with (respect to company name user entered )
